mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reserve_num, member_id, place_id, operation_id, reserve_date) values(reserve_num.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{placeId}, #{operationId}, #{date})
mapper.select: select place_id as "placeId", operation_id as "operationId", reserve_date as "reserveDate", state as "state", reg_time as "regTime" from reservation where member_id=#{memberId}

select reserve_num as "reserveNum", place_name as "placeName", reserve_date as "reserveDate", reg_time as "regDate", state as "state", operation_id as "operationId" from reservation r, place p where r.place_id=p.place_id and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.update: update reservation set state = '매칭실패' where reserve_num=#{reserveNum} and state != '예약확정'
mapper.select: select PLACE_COST from place where PLACE_NAME=#{placeName}
